comment.author: 76972834@N04
comment._content: Just wondering whether you know the christian names of the Brackenridge family?

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Sorry, we only know the initials of the patron of the photograph - a Mr. T.J. Brackenridge of Aughnacloy, County Tyrone.
